The pure class interface. 
public class ContentTypeForm
  extends ListForm
The class of content type forms.

Inputs an existing content type of the session system.

Author:
Wolfgang Grieskamp (wg@cs.tu-berlin.de)
Version: $Id: ContentTypeForm.pizza,v 1.3 1998/10/27 11:04:17 wg Exp $

defaultState

A static default state.

parse
public int parse(Session session,
                 Locator locator,
                 String[] words,
                 int start)
  throws zeta.session.Failures.FormFailed;
Parse the given sequence of words starting at index. Takes the first word in the sequence and tries to resolve it as a content type. Throws if resolution fails.

Overrides:

Unparse the internal state of the form. Returns the name of the content type.
